LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EurekacornMenu_Desc: Spend skill points to ulnock upgrades for {0_labelShort}.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EurekacornMenu_Info:
Various upgrades can be purchased here by spending Skill Points. Skill Points can be gained by consuming Eurekacorns, which can be obtained from Lynian factions, and Lynian trade requests.

<color=#E5E54C>Abilities</color>
Spend skill points to unlock additional abilities.

<color=#E5E54C>Skills</color>
Spend skill points to improve skills.

<color=#E5E54C>Traits</color>
Spend skill points to gain additional traits.

<color=#E5E54C>Knowledge</color>
View this Lynians knowledge. Knowledge can be increased by reading Lynian research notes. Knowledge is required to unlock certain abilities.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_Eurekacorn_LimitMet: {0_labelShort} must spend skill points before more can be gained.
